findings.issue: Password "password123" is weak but documented (user preference)
findings.impact: Password is predictable but system is otherwise secured
findings.recommendation: Consider upgrading to strong password when convenient

findings.issue: Single admin user - no user management or role separation
findings.impact: Cannot track who did what, no accountability, shared credentials
findings.recommendation: Implement proper user management with individual accounts

findings.issue: Secure cookie flag only enabled in production
findings.impact: Development cookies can be intercepted over HTTP
findings.recommendation: Use HTTPS in all environments, always set secure flag

findings.issue: No account lockout after failed login attempts
findings.impact: Brute force attacks are feasible despite rate limiting
findings.recommendation: Lock account for 15-30 minutes after 5 failed attempts

findings.issue: Database connection string in plain text environment variables
findings.impact: DB credentials visible in process environment
findings.recommendation: Use secrets management (AWS Secrets Manager, HashiCorp Vault)

findings.issue: No field-level encryption for sensitive data (SSN, bank details)
findings.impact: Database breach = all sensitive data exposed
Attackers can forge requests from authenticated users
findings.recommendation: Implement CSRF token validation for state-changing operations

findings.issue: File upload validation not comprehensively reviewed
findings.recommendation: Validate file types, scan for malware, limit file sizes

findings.issue: CORS allows localhost origins in production
findings.recommendation: Remove localhost origins from production CORS config

findings.issue: No real-time security monitoring or alerting
findings.impact: Breaches may go undetected for extended periods
findings.recommendation: Implement SIEM integration or security alerting

findings.impact: Potential GDPR/CCPA violations, data kept indefinitely
findings.recommendation: Define and implement data retention and deletion policies

findings.issue: No PII identification or special handling
findings.recommendation: Identify PII fields, implement encryption and access controls

findings.impact: Cannot comply with GDPR deletion requests

findings.issue: No consent tracking for data processing
findings.impact: Cannot prove compliance with consent requirements

findings.recommendation: Implement comprehensive data export for users
